name: SplitUsUp
description:
SplitUsUp is a survival shooter game for Android. Survive for 30 seconds and reach the point to end the game or see how long you can survive against the infinite hordes of enemies. Every time you get hit, you get more friends but you also get closer to shrinking into oblivion.

Do leave a comment if there is a problem. If you have a suggestion leave it too!

Contact information : yiming.tan2@gmail.com
